name: Calculate hours for XLS Panel Riser Diagram
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(FDA XLS Panel Riser Diagram:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>))*0.25)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(FDA GES Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>))*0.25))*1) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(FDA Implementation Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(FDA GES Location)*>,None))){<* Eval((((4*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>+<*VALUE(FDA Number of SLC Loops)*>))+((<*VALUE(FDA Number of Reviews (add Asbuilts) (2-5))*>*(<*VALUE(FDA Number of XLS Panels)*>))*0.25))*1)*1.1) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
